text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump But will allow Russia to pay the Taliban a bounty for the killing of US Soldiers in Afghanistan and ignore 125,000 and counting dead Americans whilst playing golf and tweeting. Did I get that right? #TraitorTrump #COVID19
